Instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit (175 degrees Celsius) and grease the cookie sheets.

Cream together butter and sugar in a medium bowl until smooth. Beat in the egg and vanilla. Stir together the flour, baking powder, and baking soda; mix into the creamed mixture alternately with the buttermilk. Drop spoonfuls of the batter onto greased cookie sheets.

When the cookies handle a smooth finish with slightly browning edges, it indicates that they are done. Let the cookies cool on baking sheets for a while before moving them to a wire rack to cool completely.
